name: Improved Weapon of the Chosen
text: You gain even greater favor when you use your deity’s favored weapon.
prerequisites: Weapon Focus with your deity’s favored weapon, Weapon of the Chosen.
benefit: This feat acts as Weapon of the Chosen, except you gain the benefits on all attacks until the start of your next turn. Your attacks gain a single alignment component of your deity—either chaotic, evil, good, or lawful—for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction. If your deity is neutral with no other alignment components, your attacks instead overcome damage reduction as though your weapon were both cold iron and silver.
staminaText: When using this feat, at the end of its normal duration you can spend 2 stamina points to extend the duration until the end of your next turn.
text_zh: 当你挥舞神祇偏好的武器时，你获得的祝福将更加强大。。
prerequisites_zh: 拥有神祇偏好武器的武器专攻专长，神选武器。
benefit_zh: 除了神选武器专长的效果外，你在启动神选武器后专长的效果将持续到你的下轮开始为止。除此之外，在克服伤害减免时，你的武器获得一个基于你神祇阵营的阵营品质——混乱，邪恶，善良或守序。如果你的神祇的阵营为绝对中立，则你的武器在克服伤害减免时同时视为寒铁和镀银武器。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，在它的正常持续时间结束时你可以消耗2点耐力来延长持续时间到你的下一回合结束。
